settings.title: Boost Iron Stores
settings.content: Contains liver, blood, and spleen – nature's unrivaled sources of bioavailable Heme Iron for unmatched absorption and vitality.

settings.title: Combat Fatigue
settings.content: Boosting baseline energy levels, this stack alleviates fatigue commonly linked to low iron, invigorating you from within.

settings.title: Superior Iron Utilization
settings.content: Integrating iron's natural co-factors like copper, enhances iron uptake and its benefits.

settings.title: Improve Red Blood Cells
settings.content: Providing essential nutrients, including Riboflavin, Folate, B12, and Choline that are pivotal for healthy red blood cell development.

settings.title: Bioavailable Nutrients
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients from natural sources deliver superior absorption, maximizing nutrient utilization for optimal benefits.

IS THE ANEMIA STACK FOR ME?

This stack is ideal for those struggling with iron deficiencies, including iron deficiency anemia. It offers comprehensive nutritional support to replenish and rejuvenate from within.

settings.quote: 4 months. No longer on thyroid meds after 15 years. Sleeping like a champ. Changed my life...
settings.author: Adam E.

settings.supporting_product_description: Beef Organs includes liver, heart, pancreas, spleen, and kidney. It is nature's ultimate multivitamin. Foundational support for overall health, vitality, and energy.
Bone Marrow & Liver is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to provide support for bone and tissue repair, skin health, and better mood.

settings.primary_product_description: Lifeblood is the foundational supplement included in the Anemia Stack. It provides unique and essential support found in grass-fed and finished whole blood extract, spleen and liver. These powerful organs include 12+ powerful nutrients to help reach your goals.

settings.title: Red Blood cells, White Blood Cells and Platelets
settings.nutrient_description: Involved in oxygen transport, the immune response, and wound healing.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12 and Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, as well as immune, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Vitamin D
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for immune, metabolic, and bone health.

settings.title: Heme Iron
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for brain health, energy and athletic performance, as well as immune function.

settings.title: Copper, Biotin and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for overall metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Vitamins A, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: In super bioavailable forms. These vitamins play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Peptides found exclusively in splenic tissue which enhance immune function.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2, an antimicrobial peptide also involved in the immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Immune Proteins
settings.nutrient_description: Immunoglobulins involved in defense against viruses and bacteria.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Lipase, Protease, and Amylase
settings.nutrient_description: Enzymes to help break down macronutrients like fat, protein and carbohydrates.

settings.title: Colipase, Trypsin, and Pancreatic Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Support the activation of enzymes needed to break down protein and help with food allergies by improving digestion.

settings.title: Anserine, Carnosine, Taurine, and L-carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Supports brain, immune, and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Kidney-specific Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Reduce the concentration of oxalates in the urine and calcium deposits in the renal tissue, as well as preventing free-radical induced damage.

settings.title: Dwarf Open Reading Frame Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as DWORF, this peptide improves cardiac function and contractility.

settings.title: Niacin
settings.nutrient_description: A B3 vitamin essential for cardiovascular health, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Gastrin-releasing Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as GRP, this peptide is found in pancreatic tissue and supports digestive processes by stimulating the release of enzymes, bicarbonate, and fluids.

settings.title: Red and yellow bone marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, brain and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Alkylglycerols
settings.nutrient_description: Support the immune system and formation of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.

settings.title: Adiponectin
settings.nutrient_description: Peptide hormone shown to support immune, metabolic, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Tissue-specific proteins, hormones, growth factors, and peptides such as bovine cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Show broad antimicrobial activity and are involved in the immune response.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Lifeblood, Beef Organs, and Bone Marrow & Liver includes vital and  potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: My energy has never been steadier and my overall well being has never been better.
settings.author: Mike P.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Our Anemia Stack aims to optimize red blood cell formation, improve low iron, boost baseline  energy levels, eliminate fatigue.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Anemia Stack?
settings.answer: If you are looking for comprehensive nutritional support for iron deficiencies including iron deficiency anemia, then this stack is for you.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal iron stores and red blood cell health.
